body.description: Ultra-Thin and Ultra-Convenient Thumb Drive 64GB, Flash Drive Get 64GB of Storage in Each Super Slim USB Drive Set With Our 4 Pack Deal The perfect solution for anyone who needs to store, transport and protect their important data. Whether you're a student, a professional or simply someone who values their privacy, our jump drives offer a discreet and reliable way to keep your information safe and close at hand. Each of our jump drives is made from repurposed plastics, and at just 2mm thick, these jump drives are incredibly slim and easy to slip into your pocket or bag, making them the perfect choice for anyone who's always on the go. With 64GB of storage capacity in each jump drive, you'll have plenty of space to store all of your important files, including documents, presentations, photos, videos and more. And thanks to their USB 2.0 compatibility, these jump drives can be used with a wide range of devices, including laptops, desktop computers, and even some smartphones and tablets. Order your four-pack today and start enjoying the benefits of these innovative jump drives!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great form factor; fits in wallet with no bulge
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for drives like this for quite a while. I keep a copy of important files in my wallet, and have used a mini drive for that, but it still bulges the wallet. These drives store even more data and are not much thicker than a credit card. Sure, USB 2.0 isn’t the fastest, and the thin form factor suggests it might not hold up to a lot of opening and closing, but if you have a need for the ‘only use it if needed’ backup drive, these are great. An added plus is that while there is a logo on the drive, there is enough blank space to label it with a marker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek little drives
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know if I’d carry them around with me because they seem a bit fragile, but we used these as thumb drives for our tvs for DVRing over the air broadcasts, and they’ve worked great for that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very durable made, but large storage capacity for price
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a 32 MB plus thumb drive, that was not too expensive as I was going to put some movie files from a family gathering on it. I ordered these and when they arrived, I was a little surprised to see the material that they are made out of. It says earth friendly and recyclable, but feels like it is made out of carboard. The way it opens seems flimsy and I gave one to a family member and spend more time explaining how to open, which way to insert it in the computer, etc. than I did with any other drive.Now on the positive side, they have 64 GB storage, and seem to work find. We will see how long they last. I think I would have liked them to be a little more durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure what devices support these flash drives, but they don't fit my laptop or any other one I tried. They are to big and a complete waste of time and money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a cool little device.
reviews.reviewText: Made of bamboo (they say recycled material) and about the size of a price tag, it's a memory stick that stores so much. For years I have kept a USB stick on my keyring with a phone number in case I lose my keys, a bunch of my favorite music, some ebooks I want to read and a few technical reference books for work, and some movies which I change periodically. Anything else I put on there is encrypted.This is a 4 pack so I can give three of these away to others to do the same. FYI these are difficult to open, but that's good because they won't accidentally open by themselves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size, takes a little practice connecting them
reviews.reviewText: These are by far the smallest thumb drives I have ever seen. Very easy to carry in a wallet or pocket.I have used 2 so far with no issue formatting or saving info. The only issue I had was initially figuring out how to insert the drive into the usb slot. It's not the same size as a regular usb-a so you have to place it right. It's not hard and I had it down after a few second delay.If you have a need for such small drives, they don't come any smaller as far as I know! I can't speak to how they hold up to being carried in a pocket but they don't feel flimsy.I recommend them. I think as with any computer component, it's best to probably be gentle on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slow, hard to open
reviews.reviewText: These flash drives are a nice idea, but poorly executed. It’s basically a thin regular flash drive taped into a bulky recycled plastic case. The plastic of the drive itself is non-recycled. The hinges of the case are badly molded, which means that the part with the drive doesn’t move very easily. When you do unfold it, it usually pops out as you can see in my picture.The drive also transfers data pretty slowly. I used them to share some old home video files with family and it took a really long time - with lots of pauses - to copy them to the drive. It’s a cool idea, but the ecological part of the concept doesn’t carry through to the drive plastic itself, and the drive case just isn’t reliable enough to use as a keychain in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tested and approved to be just what it says it is - 64GB.
El paquete de 4 USB lo compré para regalar y ha resultado genial. Resaltan los materiales para cuidar el medio ambiente, razón por las que las compré. A todos les han gustado. Excelente compra.
